languages.text: "Кроме палубы 18-Эст. Там сломан вокс-распределитель". {n}Невозмутимая ремарка Равора заставляет кого-то подавиться кашлем, какой бывает, если попытаться хохотать шепотом.{/n}
"With the exception of Deck 18-Est. The vox-relay there happened to be out of order at the time." {n}Ravor's nonchalant remark causes someone to choke in a poor attempt to suppress a chuckle.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Кроме палубы 18-Эст. Там сломан вокс-распределитель". {n}Невозмутимая ремарка Равора заставляет кого-то подавиться кашлем, какой бывает, если попытаться хохотать шепотом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "With the exception of deck 18-Est. The vox relay happened to be out of order at the moment." {n}Ravor's nonchalant remark makes someone choke, the kind of cough you get when you try to giggle quietly.{/n}

"With the exception of deck 18-Est. The vox relay happened to be out of order at the moment." {n}Ravor's nonchalant remark makes someone choke, the kind of cough you get when you try to giggle quietly.{/n}
"With the exception of deck 18-Est. The vox-relay there happened to be out of order at the time." {n}Ravor's nonchalant remark causes someone to choke in a poor attempt to suppress a chuckle.{/n}
"With the exception of deck 18-Est. The vox-relay there happened to be out of order at the time." {n}Ravor's nonchalant remark causes someone to choke in a poor attempt to suppress a chuckle.{/n}
"With the exception of Deck 18-Est. The vox-relay there happened to be out of order at the time." {n}Ravor's nonchalant remark causes someone to choke in a poor attempt to suppress a chuckle.{/n}
"With the exception of Deck 18-Est. The vox-relay there happened to be out of order at the time." {n}Ravor's nonchalant remark causes someone to choke in a poor attempt to suppress a chuckle.{/n}

languages.text: « Excepté le pont 18-Est, dont le relais-vox était en panne à ce moment-là. » {n}La remarque nonchalante de Ravor provoque l'étouffement de quelqu'un tentant de réprimer un gloussement.{/n}
languages.original_text: "With the exception of Deck 18-Est. The vox-relay there happened to be out of order at the time." {n}Ravor's nonchalant remark causes someone to choke in a poor attempt to suppress a chuckle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Excepté le pont 18-Est, dont le relais-vox était en panne à ce moment-là. » {n}La remarque nonchalante de Ravor provoque l'étouffement de quelqu'un tentant de réprimer un gloussement.{/n}

languages.text: “除了东十八号甲板，那里的音阵中继站碰巧出了故障。”{n}雷沃漫不经心的点评让某人没憋住，差点笑出了声。{/n}
languages.original_text: "With the exception of Deck 18-Est. The vox-relay there happened to be out of order at the time." {n}Ravor's nonchalant remark causes someone to choke in a poor attempt to suppress a chuckle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “除了东十八号甲板，那里的音阵中继站碰巧出了故障。”{n}雷沃漫不经心的点评让某人没憋住，差点笑出了声。{/n}

languages.text: "Mit Ausnahme von Deck 18-Est. Das Vox-Relais dort war zu diesem Zeitpunkt zufällig ausgefallen." {n}Ravors beiläufige Bemerkung führt dazu, dass jemand ein ersticktes Prusten ausstößt, weil es ihm nicht gelingt, sein Lachen zu unterdrücken.{/n}
languages.original_text: "With the exception of Deck 18-Est. The vox-relay there happened to be out of order at the time." {n}Ravor's nonchalant remark causes someone to choke in a poor attempt to suppress a chuckle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Mit Ausnahme von Deck 18-Est. Das Vox-Relais dort war zu diesem Zeitpunkt zufällig ausgefallen." {n}Ravors beiläufige Bemerkung führt dazu, dass jemand ein ersticktes Prusten ausstößt, weil es ihm nicht gelingt, sein Lachen zu unterdrücken.{/n}

languages.text: «Excepto la cubierta 18-Est. Cuando sucedió, el relé de voco de allí estaba fuera de servicio». {n}El despreocupado comentario de Ravor provoca que alguien se atragante en un intento fallido de contener una risa.{/n}
languages.original_text: "With the exception of Deck 18-Est. The vox-relay there happened to be out of order at the time." {n}Ravor's nonchalant remark causes someone to choke in a poor attempt to suppress a chuckle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Excepto la cubierta 18-Est. Cuando sucedió, el relé de voco de allí estaba fuera de servicio». {n}El despreocupado comentario de Ravor provoca que alguien se atragante en un intento fallido de contener una risa.{/n}

languages.text: 「ただし、18-Estデッキだけは。あの時、ヴォクスリレーが故障していたようです」{n}ラヴォアののんきな発言に、誰かが笑いを抑えようとして咳き込む。{/n}
languages.original_text: "With the exception of Deck 18-Est. The vox-relay there happened to be out of order at the time." {n}Ravor's nonchalant remark causes someone to choke in a poor attempt to suppress a chuckle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ただし、18-Estデッキだけは。あの時、ヴォクスリレーが故障していたようです」{n}ラヴォアののんきな発言に、誰かが笑いを抑えようとして咳き込む。{/n}

languages.text: "18. Doğu Güvertesi hariç. Oradaki voks rölesi, o sırada hizmet dışıymış." {n}Ravor'un kayıtsız yorumu, gülüşünü tutmaya çalışan birinin başarısız olup öksürmeye başlamasına sebep oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "With the exception of Deck 18-Est. The vox-relay there happened to be out of order at the time." {n}Ravor's nonchalant remark causes someone to choke in a poor attempt to suppress a chuckle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Doğu Güvertesi 18 hariç. Oradaki voks röle o sırada hizmet dışıymış." {n}Ravor'un kayıtsız yorumu, gülüşünü tutmaya çalışan birinin başarısız olup öksürmeye başlamasına sebep oluyor.{/n}
